## Sprint 6: V2 PD Hub

**Duration**: 2 weeks  
**Priority**: Medium  
**Goal**: Complete Professional Development portal

### Tasks

- [ ] **PD Calendar**
  - [ ] Display upcoming PD sessions
  - [ ] Filter by category
  - [ ] Integration with Compass PD
  - [ ] Calendar view
  - [ ] Registration links

- [ ] **PD Registration**
  - [ ] Registration forms
  - [ ] Approval workflow
  - [ ] Capacity management
  - [ ] Waitlist functionality
  - [ ] Confirmation emails

- [ ] **PD Records**
  - [ ] PD hours tracking
  - [ ] Certificate upload
  - [ ] VIT requirements tracking
  - [ ] PD history view
  - [ ] Reporting

- [ ] **PD Library**
  - [ ] PD resources
  - [ ] Past session materials
  - [ ] Recording links
  - [ ] Handouts and slides

- [ ] **Leadership Dashboard**
  - [ ] PD participation reports
  - [ ] Hours tracking
  - [ ] Compliance monitoring
  - [ ] Budget tracking

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ PD calendar displays all sessions
- ✅ Registration workflow works
- ✅ PD hours are tracked accurately
- ✅ Certificates can be uploaded
- ✅ Leadership can view reports

### Dependencies

- V1 complete
- Compass PD API access (if available)
- SharePoint for PD resources

### Notes

This completes the PD portal that helps staff track professional development.
